title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still receive an 'Invalid Credentials' error.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button appears greyed out, and they need it for tax purposes.

title: Application Crashing on Startup
description: The desktop application immediately crashes after attempting to launch. This started after the latest software update was installed.

title: Duplicate Charge on Credit Card
description: Customer was incorrectly charged twice for their monthly subscription fee on the 5th of this month. They require an immediate refund for the extra charge.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode Option
description: Requesting the implementation of a dark mode feature within the web platform for better eye comfort during long usage hours.

title: Shipping Delay on Order #4592
description: Order #4592, placed last week, has an outdated tracking number. Customer needs an update on the current location and estimated delivery date.

title: Incorrect Product Received
description: Customer ordered a Model A but received a Model B. The box clearly states the wrong model was shipped. Needs a replacement and return label.

title: Question about API Doc
description: The customer is a developer seeking clarification on the rate limiting policy mentioned in the v2 API documentation. They need specific endpoint limits.

title: Account Suspension Inquiry
description: Customer's account was suspended without warning. They are asking for the reason and steps required to restore their service immediately.

title: Email Notifications Not Working
description: Customer is not receiving any email notifications (e.g., password reset, order confirmation) despite checking their spam folder. All settings are correct.
